item.title: Spicetify で Spotify の見た目をカスタマイズする

item.title: About
item.description: Hi 👋, I’m Shunta Komatsu I am a graduate student at Tokyo University of Science. My research interests include computer vision and deep learning. I am also a web developer and my favorite languages are Go and Python. Contact Email: shuntak217@gmail.com Links Facebook GitHub GitLab Instagram Kaggle LinkedIn Medium Speaker Deck Twitter
